duties_responsibilities.duty: Quality testing, quality documentation and safety/housekeeping documentation for the plantOffice help including CSR backupEmailing of COA’s and COC’sEntering data into the Greif systems (Waste, Safety observations, Inventory)Coordinating and tracking plant safety data (SDS binder, Dust control, safety audits)Assisting with month end inventory counts & reportsAssists the supervisors, as needed, with various audits and compliance projects.Performs other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED Equivalent
